name: BRUTAL BREACH
description:
Quick game for my first jam, the GJL jam, made over the course of about 4.5 days. Expect an unfinished unpolished game, but hopefully for the right sort of people they can enjoy! Expect lots of pixelated particles, and (hopefully) cool effects.

WASD + mouse for controls ~ 1, 2, 3 for the 3 ability slots.
